stories.text:
Hello everyone,

I have put a lot of effort into building a WooCommerce plugin that sends messages through WhatsApp for various use-cases such as:

1: When an order is successfully placed 2: When the user abandons the cart 3: When someone submits a contact form 4: WhatsApp Click to chat.

I heavily invested in SEO by creating a wonderful landing page https://www.whatso.net/woocommerce-abandoned-cart.

I uploaded the plugin on AppSumo as well. I tried uploading it on CodeCanyon but somehow they didn't select it and also didn't give me a reason.

I am going to start Google Ads soon with even more focus on SEO.

I got a few customers and improved the product as well from their feedback but the kind of traction I was looking for, I am yet to get it.

I want to take the opinion of experts here on what else I can do to speed up the sales.
stories.title: Feedback needed for marketing a SaaS WooCommerce plugin
